title: Rav Shaul Alter's Heartfelt Letter
body: Rav Shaul Alter, Gerer Rosh Yeshiva, wrote a heartfelt letter to the Angrest family, expressing gratitude to Hashem for the miracle of Matan's return after two years in Hamas captivity beneath Gaza.

title: Torah Protest Delayed Expected
body: A massive asifa against the persecution of Torah learners, initially set for Sunday, is now likely to be postponed to Monday or Tuesday due to logistical challenges. The Slabodka roshei yeshiva, Rav Dov Landau and Rabbi [name], made the announcement after various factions requested more time for preparation.

title: Vandalism at Vizhnitzer Cemetery
body: Antisemitic vandals broke into Vizhnitsa cemetery in Ukraine, trampling and smashing gravestones at the resting place of generations of Vizhnitzer Rebbes.
